CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 10, 1957, pg. 14 reads: " Visiting Pittsburgh to take part in ABA tournament were some gorgeous gals and handsome men. Here, left to right, are Mr. and MRs. Cornelius Polk, Chicago (he is director of the tournament)..."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Mr. and Mrs. Cornelius Polk posed in corner of bedroom in Fort Pitt Hotel for 24th annual American Bridge Association tournament
